SELECT a.question_id as questionId, a.question_name as questionName, a.question_creator_id as questionCreatorId, a.question_level_id as questionLevelId, a.question_type_id as questionTypeId, a.question_score as questionScore, a.question_category as questionCategoryid, a.question_description as questionDescription, a.question_option_ids as questionOptionIds, a.question_answer_option_ids as questionAnswerOptionIds, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, b.question_category_name as questionCategoryName, a.question_photos as questionPhotos, c.nickname as createname FROM question a,question_category b,t_user c where a.question_category=b.question_category_id and c.id=a.question_creator_id
and a.question_creator_id=#{userid}

SELECT a.question_id as questionId, a.question_name as questionName, a.question_creator_id as questionCreatorId, a.question_level_id as questionLevelId, a.question_type_id as questionTypeId, a.question_score as questionScore, a.question_category as questionCategoryid, a.question_description as questionDescription, a.question_option_ids as questionOptionIds, a.question_answer_option_ids as questionAnswerOptionIds, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, b.question_category_name as questionCategoryName, a.question_photos as questionPhotos FROM question a,question_category b where a.question_category=b.question_category_id and a.question_type_id=#{questiontype} and a.question_category=#{category} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
